title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dawn prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq.

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the dawn prayer in a dream, the effects of the dawn prayer in a dream, on single, married and pregnant women, the meaning of the dawn prayer in the church, visions of the dawn prayer in the shrine, the dawn prayer after sunrise in the dream, the dawn prayer is one of the five acceptances of prayer in Islam, And when you see it in a dream, we do not know what its appropriate interpretation is, and therefore we will deal with the interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream according to what is stated in the dream books in detail. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer by Ibn Sirin: Interpretation of the dream of dawn prayer in a dream, as narrated by the scholar Ibn Sirin, that it indicates On atonement, guidance, drawing closer to God, and linking the dreamer to his duties. Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream is a good vision that indicates a change in the situation for the better, the beginning of a new life, and the disappearance of worries. A dream about someone praying dawn in his dream is evidence that he is a person who does not care about anything in this world, and that What matters in the afterlife is meeting his Lord. The interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream is evidence of breaking the torment of the oppressed, wealth for the poor, and healing the sick. Seeing a dream of dawn prayer in the direction of the Qiblah in a dream is evidence of many sins and transgressions that are not easy to forgive. Seeing hearing the dawn prayer Without performing the prayer in a dream is evidence of many problems, instability, and a bad psychological state, in my opinion. Interpretation of offering the dawn prayer to single women: Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will marry a suitable person whom she loves and desires. Dreaming of hearing the dawn prayer in a dream An unmarried woman is an indication of her excellence in her studies, her success in her work, and the fulfillment of all her ambitions. Seeing unmarried men praying dawn in a single woman’s dream indicates her response after a long patience. Interpreting a dream about prayer in a different way than the correct kiss in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence. However, she commits many mistakes and corrupt actions and needs to re-examine herself. Seeing the dawn prayer after sunrise in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of guidance, repentance, and getting closer to God and staying away from all prohibitions. Interpretation of offering the dawn prayer to a married woman: Interpretation of a dream about the dawn prayer and its delivery in A dream for a married woman is evidence of getting rid of worries and sorrow and the end of problems in her real life. Seeing the dawn prayer in white clothes in a dream for a married woman is evidence of performing Umrah or Hajj. And dreaming of dawn prayer in a dream in a dream for a married woman is evidence that her home is blessed, and that its people are They will have goodness, blessings, and livelihood. The interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a married woman is evidence of her lack of interest in performing her duties, and she must repent for that. Seeing the husband leading the dawn prayer in a dream for a married woman is evidence that he is a good man who loves her, appreciates her, and cares for her. Interpretation of seeing the dawn prayer Fajr prayer for a pregnant woman: Seeing the dawn prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman is an indication that the time of childbirth is approaching and the natural birth will be smooth and easy. Seeing listening to the dawn prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman in the first months of

title: Interpretation of a dream about talking and applying cool in a dream

preview.html: Seeing kohl in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man who puts kohl in the eye, buying black or green kohl from Ibn Shirin from Imam Al-Sadiq and more. Interpretation of kohl in a dream Kohl in a dream usually symbolizes money and an increase in positive and fair things in The dreamer's life. If you dream of eyeliner, it means that your bank account will see more movement, especially if you work in the commercial sector. But if you dream that you are a kohl, then this indicates the beauty of the soul that you enjoy and the good that you do for others. Whoever sees in a dream that he was given the hut, or someone gifted him with kohl in his hand, then he will take a little or a lot of money, depending on the amount of kohl and its quantity. And whoever sees In a dream, a man with dark-colored skin puts kohl on him or uses kohl, then the vision does not bode well for him. And whoever sees in a dream that he brought kohl to cover himself with it, this indicates righteousness in his religion, and if he suffers from a problem with his eyes, then God will heal him. And whoever sees That he had put kohl in his eyes, then he had two women in his life, and it was said that seeing kohl in a dream means money and justice. And whoever sees in a dream that a person has kohl and is blinded or injured his eyes, then he will spoil the money through deception and deception. As for kohl, it is money, even if its meaning By the light of sight: it is a requirement to deserve the debt, and if it is for the sake of adornment, then it is explained by the righteousness of its appearance. It was said that impersonation indicates betrayal and prestige for men and women. Interpretation of kohl in a dream for single women: A dream of kohl for a single woman indicates positive events that will occur in her professional life or studies, and she may also get some extra money for a job she did or a gift from one of her relatives. Emotionally, this may mean that you will soon meet the right man for marriage. Interpretation of kohl in a married woman’s dream: A married woman’s dream of kohl indicates remorse, especially in the event of a dispute with her husband. It can also symbolize adornment and beauty, as she was trying to attract her husband’s attention after trouble. However, if you see someone putting kohl in your eyes, this symbolizes external interference in your marital relationship, especially from your family or your husband’s family, so beware. Interpretation of kohl in a pregnant woman’s dream: This dream is interpreted as a sign of making a living or good news, which could be Evidence of an upcoming birth date or a gift, which is an amount of money given to you by a friend or relative to help with the expenses of the new child. Most importantly, your relationship with your wife will be more interconnected and you will feel happy together. Interpretation of eyeliner in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a green dinar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a green dinar in a dream or dream. The dinar is a currency for buying coins and is used in many countries such as Kuwait, Jordan, Iraq, and others. It is one of the ancient currencies used in the era of the Byzantine Empire and after the Islamic conquests and the Umayyad conflict. Interpretation of seeing the green dinar by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that it is Seeing a dinar in a dream indicates science, knowledge, wisdom, and a sign of state and rule. Seeing a dinar in a dream indicates that the boy has beautiful appearance and morals. Seeing a red dinar in a dream indicates the right and correct religion. If a person sees a dinar in his hand in a dream, it indicates that he gave his trust or his secret to someone and that person betrayed him. Seeing many dinars in the house is a sign that there are many means of livelihood and money is on its way soon. Interpretation of seeing a green dinar in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a paper dinar in a person’s dream is an indication of the approaching date of her wedding. A metal dinar in a girl’s dream is a sign of her ambitions, aspirations and dreams that she seeks to achieve. Losing a green dinar in a girl’s dream is a sign that she is losing her chances in life and needs attention. Seeing a green dinar in a girl’s dream indicates that a lot of goodness and happiness will come to her. Seeing a red dinar in a girl’s dream is for the joys, happiness, and goodness that she will get in her life on the practical and personal level. See also: Interpretation of seeing a gold dinar in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a green dinar in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a row of paper dinars for a married woman is a sign of stability, kindness and blessing in her home. If you see a married woman in a dream with twenty dinars, it is an indication of good religion and morals and closeness to God Almighty through obedience. Seeing ten Dinars for a married woman: an indication that he will have many offspring and they will be good. See also: Interpretation of seeing in a dream someone gave me banknotes. Interpretation of seeing a green dinar in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a metal dinar in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the health problems you face due to pregnancy and childbirth. The secret of metal dinars in a dream A pregnant woman determines the type of fetus that will be delivered and it will be female. If a pregnant woman sees paper dinars in a dream, it indicates that she will give birth prematurely, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a green dinosaur in a dream for a man: Seeing a man with more than four dinars in his hand is a sign of hatred. If someone sees that he is giving a dinar to someone An indication of his lack of knowledge or anything known within the limits of this dinar. Seeing a known number of dinars indicates some problems and fears that the viewer is aware of. Seeing the same man carrying a large amount of dinars in his home is a sign of hopes in reality that he will have. The dinar in a man’s dream indicates That he will have a boyish, handsome face. If one sees a dead person in a dream, he will give him a dinar. This indicates an injustice that was going to happen to him but he was prevented from doing so. Seeing a red dinar for a man in a dream indicates the goodness of Islam and its religious knowledge and cooperation with them. Seeing a green dinar in a man’s dream may be a sign of a high position. New will move to

title: Interpretation of greeting a woman in a dream about a married and pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of greeting a woman in a dream for a married and pregnant woman According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, the dream of seeing greeting a woman is one of the symbolic dreams that carry some ordinary events that reflect some different meanings and symbols, so there are many interpretations related to the dream in the interpretation books of many scholars, so in In this article today, we will learn together about the interpretation of greeting a woman in a dream about a married and pregnant woman, according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about seeing greetings in a woman in a dream Dream interpretation scholars unanimously agree that shaking hands with a man and an unknown woman in a dream is a vision that symbolizes goodness and abundance, if The woman was beautiful in the dream. In the case of a veiled greeting, this vision is a sign of the blessing of secrecy that the dreamer enjoys. In the case of shaking hands with a beautiful woman whom the man wants to marry in a dream, this vision expresses ease. This vision indicates to the man that circumstances will change for the better. And the arrival of happiness, as it indicates a short marriage for a single young man, and God knows best. This vision also indicates achieving success and success in study or work, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a single woman shaking hands in a dream. As for the symbols of this dream for an unmarried girl, peace is for a beautiful woman in a dream from Visions that promise her goodness and satisfaction. In the case of an unmarried woman who lives in peace with a beautiful woman whose son wants to marry, this vision symbolizes marriage to a man of morals and religion, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing peace for a married woman: Peace in the unknown in a dream for a married woman, A vision means the arrival of goodness, comfort, and the end of crises. If the dreamer is suffering from a financial crisis and shakes hands with a woman she does not know in a dream, this vision promises her that this crisis will end, and God knows best. If she shakes hands with many unknown women in a dream, this vision is a sign of Goodness and happiness in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing peace in a pregnant woman in a dream. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is shaking hands with many unknown women, then this vision heralds goodness. If she shakes hands with one woman in a dream, then this vision indicates that she and her fetus are in good health and in good health. Interpretation of the dream of seeing peace in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets shaking hands or greeting in a dream as a sign of mutual love and affection between the two parties. Peace can also indicate a relationship of cooperation between two parties who exchanged peace together. The interpretation of seeing peace differs for single, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. Depending on the dreamer's condition and the feeling of his dream, except for some details that the dreamer must carefully explain to the man. . Translated for an accurate explanation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing peace in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is greeting a girl like her or a married woman, then good tidings of the arrival of happiness and joy will fill her life, God willing. On the other hand, if a single woman finds herself greeting a man or shaking his hand, This may be a sign of the beginning of a new or bitter life

title: Interpretation of a dream about blood reflux from the mouth

preview.html: It may indicate getting rid of their stress or getting rid of something that causes discomfort to the viewer himself, and this is what we explained in the article from gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of a dream about blood returning from the mouth in a dream about one girl: frequent and continuous bleeding from the mouth during a woman’s sleep such that it is impossible Controlling or stopping the bleeding. The dream is a sign of successive calamities, and problems for the dreamer so that he does not catch his breath. But if the girl is having an emotional relationship or is engaged and she sees that she is bleeding from her mouth. This indicates that her fiancé broke up or left her lover, due to the lack of compatibility and understanding between the two parties. As for seeing blood reflux from the mouth and stopping, and feeling comfortable after it came out in a dream for an unmarried girl, it could indicate severing ties with people or friends who cause us psychological problems and restoring psychological peace. If an unmarried woman sees that blood has fallen on her clothes, This vision has more than one meaning and everything portends it. She declares her injustice to someone and he plans to take revenge on her and harm her. It also appears that she is jealous of someone close to her. One of the warning visions for a girl is when she sees blood bleeding in the form of lumps or parts of the stomach. It is suggested that you pay attention to what You do it with unnatural actions, such as talking about others in things that are not within them and dwelling on symptoms. See also: Interpretation of a dream about blood on the handInterpretation of seeing a dream of blood returning from the mouth in a dream about a married womanInterpretation of seeing a dream of blood returning from the mouth of a married woman can be a vent for what is in Her subconscious mind and she sees it in the form of a dream. The dream indicates a secret that she is hiding from her husband, but with blood oozing from her mouth, her secret will be revealed and get her into trouble. But if a married woman sees blood bleeding from her mouth in a dream, she often feels tired and exhausted. This is evidence that The dreamer suffered psychological harm from her relatives, and it is always in her memory, without us ever forgetting it. The reflux of blood from the mouth and parts of her intestines, teeth, or any other part coming out in a married woman’s dream is unacceptable. It indicates ongoing calamities, God forbid, that rain. On them in ways that cannot be counted and last for a long time. If a woman sees her husband trying to stop the bleeding and remove the blood from her clothes in her dream, this is a good vision. It declares the intense love that her husband has for her. He always seeks to make her happy, even if these actions are not clear. If A woman saw her son in a dream, blood coming out of his mouth, and he was actually an academic student. Perhaps the dream indicates failure in exams or dissatisfaction with academic achievement, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of the appearance of bleeding from the mouth in a dream for a man and its meaning. Interpretation of the appearance of blood reflux from a man’s mouth He is suffering from financial hardship or general problems at work. Good news for him of relief from his worries and anxiety, financial stability, and the end of his work problems. Seeing regurgitation or blood coming out of the mouth in a man’s dream could be a warning vision from God Almighty. Its indication may be that he is contaminated with witchcraft. Or envy, it is necessary to pay attention to the dhikr and the legal ruqyah, and God Almighty knows. As for

title: Learn about the interpretation of digging a grave in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Digging a grave in a dream: It can be said that the clues related to the vision of digging graves are many and their interpretation varies from one dreamer to another. Seeing graves in a dream is one of the things that expresses some evil in different interpretations, and in this article we explain what it means to dig a grave in a dream? Digging a grave in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Digging a grave in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about digging a grave indicates the idea of ​​marriage for an unmarried person, whether he is a man or a woman. But it is not a valid marriage, which means that it contains many bad deeds as seen by Imam Nabulsi. When the dreamer digs it in a wide and empty place and sits in it, the dream is an expression of the death of that person close to him, especially his illness, and God knows best. And if the opposite happens and the fortuneteller tries to fill it and get rid of it. Whoever digs it, it can be said that this person will enjoy a long, rich life with strong health. A team of interpretation scholars goes to certain interpretations related to this dream, and they are different, because some say that the dreamer who sees him is thinking about marriage or is committing many religious mistakes and carrying sins. If You dug the grave for an old man in your family, then it can be certain that this person will suffer from weakness and pain, which may force him to sit inside his house and not be able to interact and go out with people. If you find that you have dug this grave in the desert, this interpretation may warn you of Some bad things related to the heart, such as denial, offending people, or staying away from the Qur’an and Sunnah, in addition to dehydration and grease. Difficulty of mood. Digging a grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explains that when a dreamer digs a grave for himself, it is confirmation that he is thinking about buying a house or a large house, and he may be able to achieve this after seeing it. It is believed that seeing only a grave is a negative and bad sign for the dreamer and warns him Of a difficult problem and intractable issues in his reality in the coming period. The vision expresses the issue of separation and loss of a close person, and if the woman is pregnant and sees him, she must think and be very careful so as not to suffer a huge loss to the fetus. It is possible that a person will be exposed to some sorrows in his life by being exposed to such visions. A person may fall under the control of troubles and sorrows and become sad because of the many losses he is exposed to, and God knows best. Better. And if the dreamer is buried in the grave while he is alive and continues to breathe, that is, he has not died, then it has been confirmed that he does not respect the provisions of religion, and abstains from good deeds, unless he dies. At the right time, there is good news in his vision. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a group of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google. Digging a grave in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq. Imam al-Sadiq expects that the dreamer’s digging in the grave will be an expression of happiness and goodness, contrary to what some other interpreters expect. With the presence of a dug grave, conditions improve and anxiety decreases. If someone participates In prospecting for another person and he was even close to him, this indicates that there are common benefits and interests between the two parties and it is likely that it will be finalized.

title: Clues, meanings, and interpretation of the lawsuit in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a white suit in one’s dream? It indicates intimate marital happiness. The interpretation of seeing wearing a green suit in a dream? Evidence of a new job opportunity will be achieved. What is the interpretation of seeing a suit in a pregnant woman’s dream? It indicates a specific sign, which is the birth of a male child. What does it mean to see The young man himself in a black suit? Announces his imminent marriage to a beautiful girl. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a suit in her dream? It indicates a clear and clear meaning, which is an imminent promotion in her husband’s work. Individual interpretation of seeing a suit. An unmarried and unmarried girl who sees a suit in a dream indicates A certain indication that she will marry a righteous man, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream a man wearing a black suit, this is evidence that she will marry that person. Seeing a married woman’s suit A married woman who sees a suit in her dream has a clear and clear meaning, which is a promotion A relative in her husband’s work. A married woman who sees a suit in a dream indicates that she and her husband will obtain a very rich source of livelihood in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a suit for a pregnant woman. As for seeing a suit in a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates a certain significance, which is the birth of a male child, according to Expression of the scholar Ibn Sirin: Seeing a suit for individuals, but seeing a single young man wearing a black suit in his dream is good and happy skin. As for a young man who sees himself in a dream wearing a black suit, this indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl. As for seeing a white suit in one dream, this It indicates the nearness of marital happiness. Interpretation of seeing a suit for a married man: Seeing a married man wearing a suit during his sleep is not evidence of his marriage to another woman, as some think, but rather evidence of a change in his condition for the better. If a married man sees that he is wearing a suit in his dream, this is evidence of his success. In his work and the abundance of his livelihood. The interpretation of dreams varies depending on the color. Seeing a married man wearing a yellow suit during his sleep is interpreted as an illness or a health problem, and God knows best. But seeing a yellow suit sold indicates that he will recover from the disease. Seeing himself wearing a green suit in a dream means that The dreamer will obtain a new job opportunity through which he will achieve many of his ambitions and goals. Selling a black suit in a dream is interpreted as a loss of the dreamer’s money. As for seeing a man’s white suit in a dream, this indicates a pleasant complexion. If a married man sees a black suit in his dream, then It is better not to interpret it, as it is interpreted by the dreamer falling into problems and conflicts with his parents. title: Interpretation of seeing spices in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing spices in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing spices in a dream has many meanings. His sight can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether he was a man or woman, single, married, or pregnant. Today, through the Roya website, we discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. So follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing spices in a dream indicates many fears and problems in the dreamer’s life during the coming period. Seeing a spice merchant in a dream shows that soon a great financial loss will pass. Seeing a married man with spices in a dream indicates disagreements. And the many problems between him and his wife that will lead to separation. See also: Interpretation of seeing green cardamom in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing spices in Nabulsi’s dream? Seeing spices in a dream indicates the imminent death of a young family, and God knows best. Seeing spices in a dream indicates the dreamer’s loss in his work. Seeing Spices in a dream also indicate that unfavorable things will happen to the fortuneteller in the coming period. Seeing spices in a dream may indicate that the fortuneteller has lost the position in which he was working. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tattoo in a dream What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing spices in a dream? Seeing spices in a dream It is It indicates many worries and anxieties in the life of the dreamer. Seeing spices in a dream also indicates that the viewer will create his own business but will lose a lot of money. What is the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a single woman? Seeing spices in a dream shows that she will go through a bad psychological crisis and it will cause She has a lot of anxiety and distress. Seeing women alone eating spices in a dream says that she is a superficial girl who always cares about her appearance without looking at anything else. Seeing a woman alone buying spices in a dream shows that he will get married soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing meat in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream For a married woman? Seeing a married woman with spices in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and disagreements between her and her husband. Seeing red pepper for a married woman in a dream shows her inability to bear the problems and worries that occur in her life. Seeing a married woman cumin in a dream shows that she will get a lot of money in the near future. What is the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman with spices in a dream indicates that she will face some health problems during the birth process. Seeing a pregnant woman putting spices on food in a dream shows that she will get many good things in her life. Seeing green peppers A pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy and accessible birth process. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lot of food in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing spices in a dream for a man? A man seeing spices in a dream and it appears that he is far away

title: Interpretation of seeing a ring in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a ring: A ring inside a dream can indicate prestige and strength. Whoever sees in his dream that he has found weakness. Whoever sees the ring twisted in a dream or missing something, this is evidence of defects in that person. If you see a shock-absorbing ring in a dream, this indicates the presence of Many defects in the husband. If it is tight, this is a sign of marriage. If the divorced woman sees in the ring evidence of a new stable life or her return to the husband. It indicates money and a new life full of entertainment. If there is a crack in it, this indicates problems at work Or the emergence of some marital disputes. Interpretation of a ring in a dream for a single woman. A girl who sees a twisted ring in a dream indicates the bad ways of her fiancé. A ring ring in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her marriage. Seeing a ring for a girl who is not attached to the right hand, this indicates marriage in the near future. Prove The appearance of cloves means that God will bless her with a respectable husband. Losing a ring in a dream indicates annulment of the engagement. A wide ring in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her fiancé was not suitable for her, but if it was narrow, it would be good. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a married womanIf he sees a married woman Inside a dream, the silver or gold ring on the right hand shows her husband’s love for her. If she sees her husband giving her a ring, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman sees a ring with a break, this indicates bad news and events. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream a gold ring, it is The baby is female, and if it is made of silver, then it is male. If the ring is full of carnations and precious stones, the boy will be intelligent and an advisor. Interpretation of seeing a ring for a manIf a man sees it in a dream, this will be a wedding soon. If the ring is made of iron, it means goodness and money, but if it is made of gold This is evidence of some difficulties. Interpretation of a dream of a broken ring in a dream. Broken ring in a dream is one of the dreams that worries the dreamer, as breaking the ring is evidence of the nearest evil in the dreamer’s life. It is considered to be divided. It is also a sign for the dreamer that evil may be far away from him soon, but he must be patient. He has will and determination. If the dreamer is in a romantic relationship, then this vision may indicate his separation from his girlfriend or partner due to many problems that were not resolved well between them. Interpretation of a dream about wearing two gold rings for a married woman: Seeing a married woman wearing two gold rings is a sign of The great kindness and great wealth that she will have. This vision indicates a married woman and warns her of the need to stay away from selfishness and love everything related to her. Also, seeing a married woman wearing gold in a dream indicates her stable life full of happiness and hope. Gold rings in a dream generally indicate the coming of Goodness, blessing, happiness, optimism and hope in the dreamer’s life. A free girl wearing golden rings in a married woman’s dream is evidence that this single girl will be honored by God and she will marry the boy of her dreams soon. Interpretation etc.
